-- SQL statement generated by HeidiSQL when adding columns in GUI

ALTER TABLE `walks`
	ADD COLUMN `distance` DECIMAL(3,1) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `wdescription`,
	ADD COLUMN `timespent` TIME NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `distance`,
	ADD COLUMN `thumbnail` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci' AFTER `timespent`;
